dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 701 IH: To amend a provision of the Securities Act of 1933 directing the Securities and Exchange Commission to add a particular class of securities to those exempted under such Act to provide a deadline for such action.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. McHenry (for himself, Mr. Schweikert, Ms. Eshoo, Mr. Garrett, and Mr. David Scott of Georgia) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend a provision of the Securities Act of 1933 directing the Securities and Exchange Commission to add a particular class of securities to those exempted under such Act to provide a deadline for such action.

section.header: Rulemaking deadline for exempting certain securities
section.text: Section 3(b)(2) of the Securities Act of 1933 (15 U.S.C. 77c(b)(2)) is amended by striking The Commission and inserting Not later than October 31, 2013, the Commission.
